title: Vue Material Design Component Framework
description: Vuetify is a Material Design component framework for Vue.js. It aims to provide all the tools necessary to create beautiful content rich applications.
keywords: vue, material design components, vue components, material design components, vuetify, vuetify.js, component framework

404.title: Whoops, 404
404.description: Whoops, looks like whatever you are looking for is not there!

introduction/why-vuetify.title: Why Vuetify?
introduction/why-vuetify.description: Vuetify has an extremely active community, provides easy to use Material Design components and is consistently updated.
introduction/why-vuetify.keywords: why vuetify, why choose vuetify, best vue framework, best ui framework

introduction/frequently-asked-questions.title: Frequently asked questions
introduction/frequently-asked-questions.description: Stuck on a problem? Check out the most frequently asked questions by the Vuetify community.

introduction/long-term-support.title: Long-term support
introduction/long-term-support.description: Vuetify provides long-term support to the last major release for 12 months for critical bugs and security vulnerabilities.

introduction/meet-the-team.title: Meet the team
introduction/meet-the-team.description: Meet the team responsible for building Vuetify. These are the core individuals who drive the vision of the framework.
introduction/meet-the-team.keywords: vuetify dev team, vuetify core team

introduction/roadmap.title: The Vuetify Roadmap
introduction/roadmap.description: The upcoming planned features and new functionality coming to Vuetify. New components, new directives, and much much more!.
introduction/roadmap.keywords: vuetify roadmap, future plans, new vuetify features

introduction/sponsors-and-backers.title: Sponsors and backers
introduction/sponsors-and-backers.description: Help support Vuetify by backing the project. This helps with the maintenance of existing features and the development of new ones.
introduction/sponsors-and-backers.keywords: sponsor, backer, donations, patron, supporting vuetify, vuetify support

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick start
getting-started/quick-start.description: Get started with Vue and Vuetify in no time. Support for Vue CLI, Webpack, Nuxt and more.
getting-started/quick-start.keywords: quick start, vuetify templates, installing vuetify, install vuetify

getting-started/pre-made-layouts.title: Application layouts
getting-started/pre-made-layouts.description: Select from a multitude of Vuetify Material Design layouts built to help kickstart your application.
getting-started/pre-made-layouts.keywords: pre-defined layouts, layouts, application layout, material design layouts

getting-started/browser-support.title: Browser support
getting-started/browser-support.description: Vuetify is a progressive framework that supports all evergreen browsers and IE11 / Safari with polyfill.

getting-started/unit-testing.title: Unit testing
getting-started/unit-testing.description: Learn how to create unit tests with vue-test-utils and Vuetify components in your Vue application.
getting-started/unit-testing.keywords: unit testing vuetify, testing vuetify, vuetify spec tests

getting-started/releases-and-migrations.title: Releases and migrations
getting-started/releases-and-migrations.description: Stay up to date with the latest release notes. The migration guides will also help you migrate applications though major releases.

getting-started/contributing.title: Contributing
getting-started/contributing.description: Contributing to open source helps developers access amazing tools for free. Learn how you can help develop in the Vuetify framework.

customization/accessibility.title: Accessibility
customization/accessibility.description: See examples and the advantages of having accessibility (a11y) support in Vuetify components.

customization/a-la-carte.title: A-la-carte (treeshaking)
customization/a-la-carte.description: A La Carte provides automatic treeshaking via the vuetify-loader. Use only the features that you need and drastically reduce your package bundle size.
customization/a-la-carte.keywords: a la carte, a-la-carte, vuetify single import, vuetify import, component importing, reduce vuetify size

customization/breakpoints.title: Breakpoints
customization/breakpoints.description: Access the Vuetify grid system inside of components using the Breakpoint service.

customization/icons.title: Icons
customization/icons.description: Vuetify supports Material Design Icons, Font awesome and other icon sets through prefixes and global options.
customization/icons.keywords: vue icon component, iconfont, icon libraries, vuetify icons

customization/internationalization.title: Internationalization (i18n)
customization/internationalization.description: Vuetify supports language Internationalization (i18n) from a wide range of locales and easily integrates vue-i18n.

customization/rtl.title: RTL (bidirectionality)
customization/rtl.description: Vuetify is configurable and compatible with RTL languages.

customization/presets.title: Presets
customization/presets.description: Presets are Vue CLI plugins that drastically alter the look and feel of your Vuetify application.

customization/sass-variables.title: SASS variables
customization/sass-variables.description: Customize Vuetify's internal styles by modifying SASS variables.
customization/sass-variables.keywords: sass variables, scss variables, modifying Vuetify styles

customization/theme.title: Theme
customization/theme.description: Setup your application's theme and supplemental colors in a flash.

styles/text.title: CSS Text helpers
styles/text.description: Text helpers assist in modifying your application layout on varying viewport sizes with pre-configured css classes.
styles/text.keywords: Text helper classes, text classes, alignment helpers

styles/colors.title: Material color palette
styles/colors.description: Learn about the colors of Material Design. Consume the javascript color pack directly in your application.
styles/colors.keywords: colors, material design colors, vuetify color pack, material color classes

styles/content.title: Content styles
styles/content.description: Vuetify provides custom styling for various HTML elements.

styles/display.title: CSS Display helpers
styles/display.description: Display helper classes allow you to control when elements should display based upon viewport.
styles/display.keywords: display helper classes, display classes, vuetify display

styles/float.title: CSS Float helpers
styles/float.description: Float helper classes allow you to control the float property of an element based upon the viewport size.
styles/float.keywords: float helper classes, float classes, vuetify float

styles/elevation.title: CSS Elevation helpers
styles/elevation.description: Elevation helper classes allow you to control relative depth, or distance, between two surfaces along the z-axis.
styles/elevation.keywords: elevation helper classes, elevation classes, vuetify elevation

styles/flex.title: CSS Flex helpers
styles/flex.description: Flex helper classes allow you to modify flexbox parents and children.
styles/flex.keywords: flex helper classes, flex classes, vuetify flex

styles/spacing.title: CSS Spacing helpers
styles/spacing.description: Spacing helper classes allow you to apply margin or padding to any element in increments from 1 to 5.
styles/spacing.keywords: spacing helper classes, spacing classes, vuetify spacing

styles/transitions.title: Transitions
styles/transitions.description: Utilize Vuetify's built in CSS and Javascript transitions within components.

styles/typography.title: Application typography
styles/typography.description: View the various typography styles. From headings to captions, with various weights, sizes and italics.

components/api-explorer.title: API explorer
components/api-explorer.description: Search the API of Vuetify components or browse common categories.
components/api-explorer.keywords: material design components, components api, vuetify api, vuetify component categories

components/categories/forms.title: Forms category
components/categories/forms.description: A collection of Vuetify components that are commonly used when building forms.

components/categories/navigation.title: Navigation category
components/categories/navigation.description: A collection of Vuetify components that are associated with navigation and drawers.

components/categories/layout.title: Layout category
components/categories/layout.description: Vuetify Components that are useful when building layouts

components/categories/buttons.title: Buttons & Indicators category
components/categories/buttons.description: A collection of Vuetify components that are used to provide elements that the user can interact with.
components/categories/buttons.keywords: buttons and indicators category, vuetify button and indicator components

components/categories/modals.title: Popups & Modals category
components/categories/modals.description: A collection of Vuetify components that are used to draw the users attention to an action or task. Typically related to modals and alerts.
components/categories/modals.keywords: popups and modals category, vuetify popup and modal components

components/categories/tables.title: Tables category
components/categories/tables.description: A collection of Vuetify components that are used to consolidate and display tabulated or grouped data.

components/alerts.title: Alert component
components/alerts.description: The v-alert component is used to convey information to the user. Designed to stand out, the alerts come in four contextual styles.
components/alerts.keywords: alerts, vue alert component, vuetify alert component

components/application.title: Application service
components/application.description: Vuetify comes equipped with a default markup that makes it easy to create layouts (boilerplate) for any Vue application.
components/application.keywords: default layout, vuetify default markup, vuetify default layout

components/app-bars.title: App-bar component
components/app-bars.description: The app bar component is a supercharged toolbar with advanced scrolling techniques and application layout support.
components/app-bars.keywords: app bars, vuetify app bar component, vue app bar component

components/aspect-ratios.title: Aspect ratios
components/aspect-ratios.description: The responsive component is used as a wrapper component to force custom aspect ratios for its children.

components/autocompletes.title: Autocomplete component
components/autocompletes.description: The autocomplete component provides type-ahead autocomplete functionality and provides a list of available options.
components/autocompletes.keywords: autocomplete, vuetify autocomplete component, vue autocomplete component

components/avatars.title: Avatar component
components/avatars.description: The avatar component is used to control the size and border radius of an image. It can be used with numerous components to provide better visual context.
components/avatars.keywords: avatars, vuetify avatar component, vue avatar component

components/badges.title: Badge component
components/badges.description: The badge component is a small status descriptor for elements. This typically contains a small number or short set of characters.
components/badges.keywords: badges, vuetify badge component, vue badge component

components/banners.title: Banner component
components/banners.description: The banner component displays an important and succint message for a user to address. It can also provide actions for user to take.
components/banners.keywords: banners, vuetify banner component, vue banner component

components/breadcrumbs.title: Breadcrumbs component
components/breadcrumbs.description: The breadcrumbs component is a navigational helper for pages. It can accept a Material Icons icon or characters as a divider.
components/breadcrumbs.keywords: breadcrumbs, vuetify breadcrumbs component, vue breadcrumbs component, v-breadcrumbs component

components/bottom-navigation.title: Bottom navigation component
components/bottom-navigation.description: The bottom navigation component is used for mobile devices and acts as the primary navigation for your application.
components/bottom-navigation.keywords: bottom navigation, vuetify bottom navigation component, vue bottom navigation component

components/bottom-sheets.title: Bottom sheet component
components/bottom-sheets.description: The bottom sheet component is used for elevating content above other elements in a dialog style fashion.
components/bottom-sheets.keywords: bottom sheets, vuetify bottom sheet component, vue bottom sheet component

components/calendars.title: Calendar component
components/calendars.description: The calendar component is a clean and simple adaptation to the popular Google Calendar application.
components/calendars.keywords: calendars, vuetify calendar component, vue calendar component

components/cards.title: Card component
components/cards.description: The card component provides an elevatable sheet of paper to display content and provide actions on a single topic.
components/cards.keywords: cards, vuetify card component, vue card component

components/buttons.title: Button component
components/buttons.description: The button component communicates actions that a user can take and are typically placed in dialogs, forms, cards and toolbars.
components/buttons.keywords: buttons, vuetify button component, vue button component

components/button-groups.title: Button group component
components/button-groups.description: The button group component allows you to combine a series of selectable buttons together in a single-line.
components/button-groups.keywords: button groups, vuetify button group component, vue button group component

components/floating-action-buttons.title: FAB component
components/floating-action-buttons.description: The floating action button (or FAB) component is a promoted action that is elevated above the UI or attached to an element such as a card.
components/floating-action-buttons.keywords: floating action button, fab, vuetify fab component, vue fab component

components/carousels.title: Carousel component
components/carousels.description: The carousel component is used to cycle through visual content such as images or slides of text.
components/carousels.keywords: carousels, vuetify carousel component, vue carousel component

components/chips.title: Chip component
components/chips.description: The chip component allows a user to enter information, make selections, filter content or trigger actions.
components/chips.keywords: chips, vuetify chip component, vue chip component

components/chip-groups.title: Chip group component
components/chip-groups.description: The chip group component combines numerous selectable chips into single or multiple lines.
components/chip-groups.keywords: chip groups, vuetify chip group component, vue chip group component

components/color-pickers.title: Color picker component
components/color-pickers.description: The color picker component allows users to select a from pre-defined or custom colors using a variety of different inputs and formats.
components/color-pickers.keyword: color pickers, vuetify color picker component, vue color picker component

components/combobox.title: Combobox component
components/combobox.description: The combobox component provides type-ahead autocomplete functionality and allows users to provide a custom values beyond the provided list of options.
components/combobox.keywords: comboboxes, vuetify combobox component, vue combobox component

components/dividers.title: Divider component
components/dividers.description: The divider component is a thin line commonly used to separate groups of content in lists or layouts.
components/dividers.keywords: dividers, vuetify divider component, vue divider component

components/data-iterators.title: Data iterator component
components/data-iterators.description: The data iterator component is used for filter and displaying data including sorting, searching, pagination, and selection.
components/data-iterators.keywords: data iterators, vuetify data iterator component, vue data iterator component

components/data-tables.title: Data table component
components/data-tables.description: The data table component is used for displaying tabular data in a way that is easy for users to scan. It includes sorting, searching, pagination and selection.
components/data-tables.keywords: data tables, vuetify data table component, vue data table component

components/dialogs.title: Dialog component
components/dialogs.description: The dialog component informs a user about a specific task and may contain critical information or require the user to take a specific action.
components/dialogs.keywords: dialogs, vuetify dialog component, vue dialog component

components/expansion-panels.title: Expansion panel component
components/expansion-panels.description: The expansion panel component is a lightweight container that hides information behind expandable and contractable containers.
components/expansion-panels.keywords: expansion panels, vuetify expansion panel component, vue expansion panel component

components/footer.title: Footer component
components/footer.description: The footer component provides a container for displaying additional navigation information about a site.
components/footer.keywords: footers, vuetify footer component, vue footer component

components/grids.title: Grid system
components/grids.description: Vuetify supports the 12 point Material Design grid for laying out and controlling breakpoints for your application.
components/grids.keywords: grids, vuetify grid component, layout component, flex component

components/file-inputs.title: File input component
components/file-inputs.description: The file input component is a specialized input that provides a clean interface for selecting files, showing detailed selection information and upload progress.
components/file-inputs.keywords: file input, file upload, file field

components/forms.title: Form component
components/forms.description: The form component provides a wrapper that makes it easy to process and control validation states of input components.
components/forms.keywords: forms, vuetify form component, vue form component, form validation

components/hover.title: Hover component
components/hover.description: The hover component makes it easy respond when the user hover events by wrapping selectable content.
components/hover.keywords: hover, vuetify hover component, vue hover component

components/icons.title: Icon component
components/icons.description: The icon component is compatible with multiple common iconfonts such as Material Design Icons, Font Awesome and more.
components/icons.keywords: icons, vuetify icon component, vue icon component

components/images.title: Image component
components/images.description: The image component provides a flexible interface for displaying different types of images.
components/images.keywords: images, vuetify image component, vue image component

components/inputs.title: Input component
components/inputs.description: The input component is the baseline functionality for all of Vuetify's form components and provides a baseline for custom implementations.
components/inputs.keywords: inputs, vuetify input component, vue input component

components/item-groups.title: Item group component
components/item-groups.description: The item group components provides the ability to create a group of selectable items out of any component.
components/item-groups.keywords: item groups, vuetify item group component, vue item group component

components/lazy.title: Lazy component
components/lazy.description: The lazy component allows you to dynamically render content based upon the user's viewport.

components/lists.title: List component
components/lists.description: The list component is a continous group of text, images and icons that may contain primary or supplemental actions.
components/lists.keywords: lists, vuetify list component, vue list component

components/list-item-groups.title: List item group component
components/list-item-groups.description: The list item group component provides an interface for displaying a series of content using list items.
components/list-item-groups.keywords: list-groups, vuetify list item group component, vue list item group component

components/menus.title: Menu component
components/menus.description: The menu component exposes a drop down of potential selections or actions that the user can make.
components/menus.keywords: menus, vuetify menu component, vue menu component

components/navigation-drawers.title: Navigation drawer component
components/navigation-drawers.description: The navigation drawer component contains internal navigation links for an application and can be permanently on-screen or controlled programmatically.
components/navigation-drawers.keywords: navigation drawer, vuetify navigation drawer component, vue navigation drawer component

components/overflow-btns.title: Overflow button component
components/overflow-btns.description: The overflow button component creates an interface for a select that contains additional features and functionality.
components/overflow-btns.keywords: overflow buttons, vuetify overflow button component, vue overflow button component

components/overlays.title: Overlay component
components/overlays.description: The overlay component makes it easy to create a scrim or hovering effect over components or your entire application.
components/overlays.keywords: overlays, vuetify overlay component, vue overlay component

components/paginations.title: Pagination component
components/paginations.description: The pagination component is used to separate long sets of data so that it is easier for a user to consume information.
components/paginations.keywords: pagination, vuetify pagination component, vue pagination component

components/parallax.title: Parallax component
components/parallax.description: The parallax component creates a 3d effect that makes an image appear to scroll slower than the window.
components/parallax.keywords: parallax, vuetify parallax component, vue parallax component

components/date-pickers.title: Date picker component
components/date-pickers.description: The date picker component is a stand-alone interface that allows the selection of a date, month and year.
components/date-pickers.keywords: date pickers, vuetify date picker component, vue date picker component

components/time-pickers.title: Time picker component
components/time-pickers.description: The time picker component is a stand-alone interface that allows the selection of hours and minutes in AM/PM and 24hr formats.
components/time-pickers.keywords: time pickers, vuetify time picker component, vue time picker component

components/progress-circular.title: Progress circular component
components/progress-circular.description: The progress circular component is useful for displaying a visual indicator of numerical data in a circle.
components/progress-circular.keywords: progress circular, vuetify progress circular component, vue progress circular component, circular progress

components/progress-linear.title: Progress linear component
components/progress-linear.description: The progress-linear component is useful for displaying a visual indicator of numerical data in a straight line.
components/progress-linear.keywords: progress linear, vuetify progress linear component, vue progress linear component, linear progress

components/ratings.title: Star rating component
components/ratings.description: The star rating component is a specialized widget for collecting user feedback via ratings.
components/ratings.keywords: star ratings, vuetify star rating component, vue star rating component, rating component

components/sheets.title: Sheet component
components/sheets.description: The sheet component is the default paper element in Vuetify and serves as the baseline for many Material Design implementations.
components/sheets.keywords: sheets, vuetify sheet component, vue sheet component

components/skeleton-loaders.title: Skeleton loaders component
components/skeleton-loaders.description: The v-skeleton-loader component is a versatile tool that can fill many roles within a project. At its heart, the component provides an indication to the user that something is coming but not yet available.

components/simple-tables.title: Simple table component
components/simple-tables.description: The simple table component is a lightweight wrapper around the table element that provides a Material Design feel without all the baggage.
components/simple-tables.keywords: simple table, vuetify simple table component, vue simple table component, table component

components/sliders.title: Slider component
components/sliders.description: The slider component is a better visualization of the number input. It is used for gathering numerical user data.
components/sliders.keywords: sliders, vuetify slider component, vue slider component

components/slide-groups.title: Slide group component
components/slide-groups.description: The slide group component is similar to item groups in that you can make selectable content out of elements but does so in a single line fashion.
components/slide-groups.keywords: slide groups, slideable groups, vuetify slide group component, vue slide group component

components/snackbars.title: Snackbar component
components/snackbars.description: The snackbar component informs user of a process that your application has performed is will perform. It can be temporary and often contains actions.
components/snackbars.keywords: snackbars, vuetify snackbar component, vue snackbar component

components/sparklines.title: Sparkline component
components/sparklines.description: The sparkline component creates beautiful and expressive simple graphs for displaying numerical data.
components/sparklines.keywords: sparklines, vuetify sparkline component, vue sparkline component, sparkline, graph, chart, line

components/steppers.title: Stepper component
components/steppers.description: The stepper component provides a linear progression process for gathering and displaying information to a user, similar to a form wizard.
components/steppers.keywords: steppers, vuetify stepper component, vue stepper component

components/selection-controls.title: Selection control components
components/selection-controls.description: Selection control components allows users to complete tasks that require the selection of various options, such as settings.
components/selection-controls.keywords: selection controls, vuetify selection controls, vuetify checkbox component, vuetify radio component, vuetify switch component

components/selects.title: Select component
components/selects.description: The select component provides a list of options that a user can make selections from.
components/selects.keywords: selects, vuetify select component, vue select component

components/subheaders.title: Subheader component
components/subheaders.description: The subheader component is used to provide context of sections of content or filtering and sorting criteria.
components/subheaders.keywords: subheaders, vuetify subheader component, vue subheader component

components/system-bars.title: System-bar component
components/system-bars.description: The system bar component creates an android style status bar that rests on the very top of your application.
components/system-bars.keywords: system bars, vuetify system bar component, vue system bar component, android status bar, status bar

components/tabs.title: Tabs component
components/tabs.description: The tabs component provides a way to organize and navigate between groups of content that are related at the same level of hierarchy.
components/tabs.keywords: tabs, vuetify tabs component, vue tabs component

components/timelines.title: Timeline component
components/timelines.description: The timeline component is used to display chronological information horizontally.
components/timelines.keywords: timelines, vuetify timeline component, vue timeline component

components/textarea.title: Textarea component
components/textarea.description: The textarea component is a text field that accepts lengthy textual input from users.
components/textarea.keywords: textareas, vuetify textarea component, vue textarea component

components/text-fields.title: Text field component
components/text-fields.description: The text field component accepts textual input from users.
components/text-fields.keywords: text fields, vuetify text field component, vue text field component

components/toolbars.title: Toolbar component
components/toolbars.description: The toolbar component sits above the content that it affects and provides an area for labeling and additional actions.
components/toolbars.keywords: toolbars, vuetify toolbar component, vue toolbar component

components/tooltips.title: Tooltip component
components/tooltips.description: The tooltip component displays textual information regarding the element it is attached to.
components/tooltips.keywords: tooltips, vuetify tooltip component, vue tooltip component

components/treeview.title: Treeview component
components/treeview.description: The treeview component is a user interface that is used to represent hierarchical data in a tree structure.
components/treeview.keywords: treeview, vuetify treeview component, vue treeview component

components/windows.title: Window component
components/windows.description: The window component is a wrapper container that allows transitioning between content. It serves as the baseline for tabs and carousels.
components/windows.keywords: windows, vuetify window component, vue window component

directives/intersect.title: Intersection observer directive
directives/intersect.description: The intersection observer directive utilizes the Intersection observer API. It allows you to determine when elements are visible on the screen.
directives/intersect.keywords: intersect, vuetify intersect directive, intersection observer directive

directives/mutate.title: Mutation observer directive
directives/mutate.description: The mutation observer directive utilizes the Mutation observer API. It allows you to determine when elements are updated.
directives/mutate.keywords: mutate, vuetify mutate directive, mutation observer directive

directives/resizing.title: Resizing directive
directives/resizing.description: The resize directive provides the ability to conditionally invoke functions when the screen is resized.
directives/resizing.keywords: resize, vuetify resize directive, vue resize directive, window resize directive

directives/ripples.title: Ripple directive
directives/ripples.description: The ripple directive adds touch and click feedback to any element in the form of a water ripple.
directives/ripples.keywords: ripples, ink, vuetify ripple directive, vue ripple directive

directives/scrolling.title: Scrolling directive
directives/scrolling.description: The scroll directive gives you the ability to conditionally invoke methods when the screen or an element are scrolled.
directives/scrolling.keywords: scroll, vuetify scroll directive, vue scroll directive, window scroll directive

directives/touch-support.title: Touch Support directive
directives/touch-support.description: The touch directive provides an interface for responding to various user touch actions.
directives/touch-support.keywords: touch, vuetify touch directive, vue touch directive, mobile touch directive

examples/layouts/baseline.title: Basic layout example
examples/layouts/baseline.description: A basic application layout implemented using Vuetify components.

examples/layouts/baseline-flipped.title: Basic flipped layout example
examples/layouts/baseline-flipped.description: A basic flipped application layout implemented using Vuetify components.

examples/layouts/centered.title: Centered layout example
examples/layouts/centered.description: A centered application layout implemented using Vuetify components.

examples/layouts/complex.title: Complex layout example
examples/layouts/complex.description: A complex application layout implemented using Vuetify components.

examples/layouts/dark.title: Dark layout example
examples/layouts/dark.description: A dark application layout implemented using Vuetify components.

examples/layouts/google-contacts.title: Google contacts layout example
examples/layouts/google-contacts.description: A Google Contacts application example implemented using Vuetify components.
examples/layouts/google-contacts.keywords: google contacts template, pre-made, vuetify layout

examples/layouts/google-keep.title: Google keep layout example
examples/layouts/google-keep.description: A Google Keep application example implemented using Vuetify components.
examples/layouts/google-keep.keywords: google keep template, pre-made, vuetify layout

examples/layouts/google-youtube.title: Google youtube layout example
examples/layouts/google-youtube.description: A Youtube application example implemented using Vuetify components.

examples/layouts/sandbox.title: Layout sandbox
examples/layouts/sandbox.description: A layout sandbox where you can try different variations of layout setups.

professional-support/consulting.title: Consulting and support
professional-support/consulting.description: Get professional help, support and guidance for your Vuetify application from the creator, John Leider.
professional-support/consulting.keywords: vuetify consulting, vuetify support, vuetify help

professional-support/business.title: Consulting and support
professional-support/business.description: Get professional help, support and guidance for your Vuetify application while supporting the framework.
professional-support/business.keywords: vuetify business, vuetify business support, vuetify help

professional-support/enterprise.title: Vuetify for enterprise
professional-support/enterprise.description: Get the tools you need to continuously catalog and understand the open source software that your application depends on with the Tidelift subscription.
professional-support/enterprise.keywords: vuetify enterprise, tidelift enterprise, tidelift vuetify

themes/premium.title: Premium & free themes
themes/premium.description: Vuetify offers numerous pre-build starter and premium themes. Kickstart your next application today, no design skills needed.
themes/premium.keywords: vuetify themes, pre-built material themes, premium themes
